nodes.text: LRC077 was an Imperial cadet squad of the Academy for Young Imperials on Lothal, consisting of eight cadets divided into two units. Unit Aurek was a unit of this squad, whose members were Ezra Bridger (under the alias of "Dev Morgan"), Jai Kell, Zare Leonis, Nazhros Oleg, and Pandak Symes, whom Bridger briefly replaced after Symes washed out of the Academy. After Bridger's departure, he was replaced with Kabak. Unit Besh was the second unit of LRC077, consisting of Uzall, Giles, Betancy, and Thurgos.
In Servants of the Empire: Rebel in the Ranks, the designation is instead given as NRC-077.
